page.title: 11Conoco Oil Exploration.
page.content: An{Oil Company}called{Conoco}started drilling at Palmer's Wood , near Godstone, and struck oil in l983 . A group of children from our School recently visited the site. The Manager met us and gave us hard hats to protect our heads. We saw the{"Nodding {Donkey"}pump which nods {8} times a minute and pumps out{2}gallons of oil each stroke. This pump replaced the original derrick. The Drill goes down {995 feet }and pumps up {335 barrels}of oil a day. Each barrel is worth {$25} and {12-13 tanker loads}leave the site each week. Conoco are seeking permission to drill at Coney Hill sand pit to the West of Oxted and Broom- lands Farm to the East. They have sent letters to thousands of residents in{Godstone}and{Oxted}to explain their operations, & are holding an exhibit- ion in St. Mary's Church Hall.
